text.title:
Ossian's interactive full network. 
Nodes colored by communities
text.more:
The character network for the epic poems of Ossian. 
A different colour has been set for each community identifier.
Louvain method was used for the community detection algorithm.
Five main communities were detected.
Smaller communities of n < 2% have been grouped together and are represented by 
nodes in grey.
The edges (links) represent interactions or relationships between pairs of 
characters.
text.intro:
The character network for the epic poems of Ossian. 
A different colour has been set for each community identifier.
Louvain method was used for the community detection algorithm.
Six main communities were detected.
Smaller communities of n < 2% have been grouped together and are represented by 
nodes in grey.
The edges (links) represent interactions or relationships between pairs of 
characters.
